summary: The diff only updates project_state.json with pending request metadata; it does not add the required logo/favicon assets or restore header/footer and favicon branding references. All stated requirements remain unimplemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded logo image (LOGO-2.jpeg) to the frontend as optimized static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, ensuring the files exist at the exact paths already referenced by the app (/assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png, /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_128x128.png, /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png).
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated; the diff shows no added assets at the required paths.
evidence: File diff summary shows: Added: 0; ADDED FILES: none

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the site header and footer display the logo image using the existing references to /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-logo.dim_512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend component files were modified; there are no changes indicating header/footer logo rendering was restored.
evidence: File diff summary shows only project_state.json modified; no frontend source/component files changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the favicon loads correctly using the existing references in frontend/index.html to /assets/generated/ml-enterprise-favicon.dim_32x32.png.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/index.html was not modified and no favicon asset file was added, so the favicon cannot be ensured to load per the requirement.
evidence: File diff summary shows no changes to frontend/index.html and no added favicon asset; only project_state.json modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated internal request-tracking metadata in project_state.json (new_feature_requests AR-1..AR-4, known issue note) which is not part of the BuildRequest deliverables.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on adding static assets and restoring logo/favicon behavior; it does not request changes to project_state.json or adding tracking entries.
